body_html: @yongjik I suffered a lot tuning the indexSelectKernel and I found the kernel is mainly limited by read_throughput. I suspects that we should focus more on reducing the memory read operations and improving the locality, rather than only computational cost.
body_text: @yongjik  I suffered a lot tuning the indexSelectKernel and I found the kernel is mainly limited by read_throughput. I suspects that we should focus more on reducing the memory read operations and improving the locality, rather than only computational cost.
body: @yongjik  I suffered a lot tuning the `indexSelectKernel` and I found the kernel is mainly limited by `read_throughput`. I suspects that we should focus more on reducing the memory read operations and improving the locality, rather than only computational cost.
